 It may be several days before I respond.  I am very busy with a project at Bosworth Field, at the moment, but am hopeful of a positive outcome.
 
  Yours,
 
  R. Plantagenet.

   "Officially required" by whom?  I do not enter into these things lightly.  I have no notion of where this inheritance came from and will not surrender any information until I have been sufficiently persuaded that I am, in fact, the person to whom this fund belongs.
 
 I have never had any business in Africa.  Simply holding onto my hard-won position here takes all the time and energy I possess.  Have you any idea how many people would love to see me lying on the ground a bloody corpse while they steal all I have fought so hard to retain?  Half of my family plots against me, recruiting assassins from Wales and France to make attempts on my life.
 
 And you, a total stranger, tell me that I'm "officially  required" to do something.
 
 By St. George, I've never met with such effrontery in my life.
 
    Plantagenet.
